2018.title: Zeek (formerly Bro)
2018.description: Zeek, rebranded from Bro in 2018, is a powerful open‑source network security monitoring platform providing deep insights and protocol analysis across large networks.

2018.title: Lynis
2018.description: Lynis is an extensible open‑source security auditing and hardening tool for Unix‑based systems (Linux, macOS, BSD), widely adopted after feature expansions in 2018–2019.

2018.title: ZMap
2018.description: ZMap is an open‑source fast internet scanner capable of scanning the entire IPv4 address space in minutes; it saw increased use and updates around 2018.

2018.title: OSQuery enhancements
2018.description: Originally from 2014, OSQuery gained major community, cloud, and cross‑platform enhancements in 2018, making it a common choice for host‑based inventory, telemetry, and security auditing.

2018.title: Security Onion 16
2018.description: Security Onion, a Linux distro for network security monitoring (bundling Zeek, Suricata, Wazuh, etc.), released major 2018 updates improving integrated detection, indexing, and visualization.
